snippet: Video footage of Rafael Nadal showed how he has toned down his image, added mannerisms before his serve and strengthened his backhand and serving motion.
abstract: Christopher Clarey On Tennis column; video footage of Rafael Nadal's first French Open final in 2005 shows how he has toned down his image, added mannerisms before his serve and strengthened his backhand and serving motion; Nadal is preparing to face fellow Spaniard David Ferrer in 2013 French Open men's final in pursuit of his eighth tournament singles title.
lead_paragraph: Video footage of Rafael Nadal showed how he has toned down his image, added mannerisms before his serve and strengthened his backhand and serving motion.

headline.main: A Review of Nadal’s Look, Mannerisms and Game
headline.print_headline: In 2005 Video of Nadal, Bare Shoulders and Fewer Tics
